Infectum.text: 1)aq qayse di ṣoba xariǧi  the fire wood of stove is over/has burned down. (İshaq Arkaḥ p.c) 2)Ono koxoraǧno bi briṯaṯe. I am getting accustomed to this world. (İlyas p.c)
Panǝk alo iḏan mǝmlǝnwa kube hŭl d-mixarǧiwa. Because of those ones, gosh, our hands were filled with thorns untill they were inured. (No 183: 2018_07_au_003_NE_1F.

Preterit.text: 1)Mxaraǧno bu kewo pis. I was exhausted by a severe illness.(İlyas p.c) Mxaraǧno bi dawlaṯe. I have been exhausted (fucked up) in this country. (İlyas p.c)
mxarǧi aḥ ḥayayḏi bu ṭurano (meqǝm ruḥayye). My life was spent (by itself, anticausative) in this mountainside. (İlyas p.c.: pis yo)
Mxarǧi aḥ ḥayayḏi bi walayaṯe. My life has been spent in this city. (İlyas p.c)
2) mxarǧina me-ʕal ḥḏoḏe ʻ(wir wollten uns auf einer belebten Strasse treffen) und haben uns verfehltʼ; 222;(IT IS NOT CLEAR)
3) mxaraǧno bu+ḥappәs ‘I got used to prison’ (Ilyas.p.c.)

Infectum.text: 1)Gmaxraǧno aḥ ḥayayḏi bu yǝlfono di ʕito. I am going to spend all my life in the studying the church (tradition). İlyas p.c

Preterite.text: 1)Maxraǧli aḥ ḥayayḏi b ṭur abdin. I spent my live in Tur abdin (no evaluation, no bad sense).(İlyas p.c)
1)Adyawma maxraǧli mate waroqe.Today I spent 100 liras. (İlyas p.c)
2)Li dawlaṯe maxraǧlali.This country used me up. (İlyas p.c)
2)Li ḥurmaṯe maxraǧlali. Ono mtaxraǧno (mu gabo di ḥurmaṯe).  (İlyas p.c)
This woman used me up. I am used up (by this woman).= qtilali, matәmlali, bʕeǧlali, т. е. Она довела меня
2)[Li ḥurmaṯe maxraǧlali]. Ono mtaxraǧno (mu gabo di ḥurmaṯe).  (İlyas p.c)
This woman used me up. I am used up (by this woman). (İlyas p.c)

idioms: 1)To be exhausted, to be used up completely, 2)Verfehlen; 3) to get used
